CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleRectTileEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Kinematicbody = event.Kinematicbody local TileInfo = event.TileInfo local TileMap = event.TileMap local TilePosition = event.TilePosition -------------------------------------------------------- if TileInfo.Name == "House_red" and Kinematicbody:IsOnGround() then self.Entity.KeyReverse.Enable = false self.Entity.CustomPlayerComponent.Enable = true log("ReverseKeyOff") end
